projects.title: Peep n Chill
projects.description: Peep n Chill is a full stack web based appication. It is a blog type inspired project, that allows users to browse through posts created by other users. Users are only allowed to post if they are a registered user and must log in. At the moment, it is only available to access from localhost but it has all the data stored in the cloud. Front-end has been deployed already but will not display any data, as I'm trying to deploy the back-end as a monorepo with the front-end.

projects.title: News Summary API
projects.description: News summary is a front-end web based appication. It gathers live news using the guardian API , that allows users to browse through posts created by other users. Users are only allowed to post if they are a registered user and must log in.
